attributes.action: introduce vehicle-clamper hunting, with dogs. As a national sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For decades successive governments have shirked their responsibility to control the vehicle-clamping pest, in England and Wales (there are controls in Scotland).  The introduction of a law allowing their hunting, with packs of dogs and on horseback, would provide an enjoyable sporting spectacle for the resident population and almost certainly be a boost to tourism.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
